name: Mayday (itch) (Giorgiutti Etore)
description:
A little exploration game made for ocean jam, and reworked after. 

Explore an abandonned planet, destroy obstacles and find ressources !

Next features will be added in the next months to really showcase what the game was meant to be !

Game done by :

- Adrien LEDENTU

- Kyllian MOSNIER

- Danial LALMI

- Tristan MINGEAT

- Etoré GIORGIUTTI
